name: Defend The Lighthouse
description:
SUMMARY

It is a tower defense game  where you have defend the lighthouse and the bridges from the cars

WEBGL version coming soon !!

----------------------------------------------------

                                                                    CONTROLS

Controls are easy

just use mouse from clicking 

Camera controller - A/S/D/W and Scroll wheel for zoom in and out

Consider supporting the game for further development . off if you like it

Hope you like it
